* Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.9.3 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.9.3) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.9.3))

FIX: The build.gradle is now compatible with Gradle 7.x and above (changing from deprecated compile to implementation)

* New event for `unityads.MSG_BANNER`: `unityads.EVENT_DID_SHOW`
* Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.8.0 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.8.0) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.8.0))
* Update `info.plist` with the newest `SKAdNetworkIdentifier`

* Use Podfile for iOS. **This version of the extension requires Defold 1.4.6+**
* Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.7.1 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.7.1) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.7.1))
* Update `info.plist` with the newest `SKAdNetworkIdentifier`

* Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.6.1 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.6.1) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.6.1))
* Update `info.plist` with the newest `SKAdNetworkIdentifier`

* Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.5.0 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.5.0) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.5.0))
* Update `info.plist` with the newest `SKAdNetworkIdentifier`
Added iOS simulator support

- Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.4.1 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.4.1) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.4.1))
- Update info.plist with the newest SKAdNetworkIdentifier

- Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.4.0 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.4.0) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.4.0))
- Update info.plist with the newest SKAdNetworkIdentifier
- New error type `unityads.ERROR_TIMEOUT` for `unityads.MSG_SHOW` added
Update `info.plist` with the newest SKAdNetworkIdentifier
Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.2.1 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.2.1) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.2.1))
Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.2.0 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.2.0) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.2.0))

- Updated Unity ADS SDK to 4.1.0 ([iOS](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/4.1.0) / [Android](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/4.1.0))
* Fix issue when banner cut by navigation bar https://github.com/AGulev/DefVideoAds/issues/24

- Use smaller scope for the callback's mutex to avoid possible ANRs/Crashes
- Use new Defold SDK API (1.2.188) for attaching VM thread and loading java class
* fix issue `local variable placementId is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final` in some Defold versions
All the EVENT_SDK_ERROR messages now contain`placement_id`
* Use the latest at the moment Android SDK 3.7.5
* FIX issue for android
* AVFAudio in ext.manifest fixes crash on devices with iOS <14.5 when build using SDK 14.5 required Defold 1.2.185
* Updated UnitySDK to 3.7.4
Updated UnitySDK to 3.7.4

**BREAKING CHANGES:**
- Lua style API with underlines (for example `unityads.is_ready(placement_id)` intend of `unityads.isReady(placementId)`)
- New callback format with `message_id` and `message.event` and better error handling

**NEW:**
- New parameter `enable_per_placement_load ` in `unityads.initialize()` - this parameter allows loading content for a specific Placement prior to displaying it using `load(placement_id)` method
- New `unityads.load(placement_id)` method for loading ads manually (works only if `enable_per_placement_load ` is `true`)
- New `unityads.request_idfa()` method to request showing of IDFA popup on iOS before initialization of SDK. On Android it always fires callback with MSG_IDFA/EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED
ADD: New items in SKAdNetworkItems

BREAKING CHANGE: Minimum Android SDK Version is 19
UPDATE: UnityADS SDK updated to v3.7.2 [iOS changes](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-ios/releases/tag/3.7.2) / [Android changes](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-android/releases/tag/3.7.2)
CHANGE: Use Gradle for Android SDK instead of `jar` file


![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2209596/119895871-8ed2f680-bf3e-11eb-90bc-cf3159a76d0a.png)

* UnityADS SDK updated to v3.7.1.
* Updated plist with new SKAdNetworkIdentifier

* Include all the Unity ADS networks in SKAdNetworkItems https://github.com/AGulev/DefVideoAds/issues/19
* New option in 'game.project' 'unityads.tracking_usage_description' (optional) to use in 'NSUserTrackingUsageDescription' https://github.com/AGulev/DefVideoAds/issues/18

Apple [has recently announced](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/storekit/skadnetwork/configuring_the_participating_apps) that all SKAdNetworkIDs must be in lower case to work properly in the new ATT framework.

UPDATE: UnityADS SDK updated to v3.5.1.
> In order for ads to be served and measured properly with iOS14 changes coming in 2021, you will need to update to 3.5.1.  Unity recently discovered a bug in the SKAdNetwork functionality in 3.4.8 and 3.5 that prohibits these versions from correctly passing SKAdNetwork.
